00027  * @brief  Class for reporting results of quantification methods.

00029 #ifndef _QUANTMETHODEXPRCCCHPREPORT_H_
00030 #define _QUANTMETHODEXPRCCCHPREPORT_H_
00031 
00032 //
00033 #include "chipstream/AnalysisInfo.h"
00034 #include "chipstream/ChipSummary.h"
00035 #include "chipstream/QuantExprMethod.h"
00036 #include "chipstream/QuantMethodReport.h"
00037 //
00038 #include "calvin_files/writers/src/CalvinCHPQuantificationFileBufferWriter.h"
00039 #include "calvin_files/writers/src/CalvinCHPQuantificationFileWriter.h"
00040 #include "util/Util.h"
00041 //
00042 #include <cstdlib>
00043 #include <iostream>
00044 //
00045 
00046 /**
00047  *   Class for reporting results of quantification methods.
00048  */
00049 class QuantMethodExprCCCHPReport : public QuantMethodReport {
00050 
00051 public:
00052   
00053   /** Constructor. */
00054   QuantMethodExprCCCHPReport(AnalysisInfo& chpInfo,
00055                              const std::string& prefix,
00056                              const std::string algName);
00057   
00058 
00059   /** Destructor. */
00060   ~QuantMethodExprCCCHPReport();
00061 
00062   /**
00063    * Set the CHP filenames to use for output. This overrides any prefix and allows
00064    * the caller to place the chp files anyplace they are desired.
00065    * @param fileNames - Vector of fileNames with full path to output
00066    * file, one for each cel file.
00067    */
00068   void setChpFileNames(std::vector<std::string> &fileNames);
00069 
00070   /** 
00071    * Get set up for a run of reporting probesets. Often used to open file
00072    * streams and print headers to files etc.
00073    * 
00074    * @param qMethod - Quantification method to be used.
00075    * @param layout - Where the probesets, probes, etc are on the chip.
00076    * 
00077    * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00078    */
00079   bool prepare(QuantMethod &qMethod, const IntensityMart &iMart);
00080 
00081   /** 
00082    * After every probeset computation this function is called an is an opportunity
00083    * to query the quantification method for results, residuals, etc.
00084    * 
00085    * @param psGroup - List of probesets from which probes were used.
00086    * @param qMethod - Quantification method with compute method called.
00087    * @param layout - Where the probesets, probes, etc are on the chip.
00088    * 
00089    * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00090    */
00091   bool report(ProbeSetGroup &psGroup, QuantMethod &qMethod,
00092               const IntensityMart &iMart, std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans, 
00093               PmAdjuster &pmAdjust);
00094 
00095   /** 
00096    * If a probeset fails to compute for whatever reason then this method is
00097    * called rather than the normal report call above. By default does nothing.
00098    * 
00099    * @param psGroup - List of probesets from which probes were used.
00100    * @param qMethod - Quantification method with compute method called.
00101    * @param layout - Where the probesets, probes, etc are on the chip.
00102    * 
00103    * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00104    */
00105    bool reportFailure(ProbeSetGroup &psGroup, 
00106                       QuantMethod &qMethod, 
00107                       const IntensityMart &iMart, 
00108                       std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans, 
00109                       PmAdjuster &pmAdjust);
00110 
00111   /** 
00112    * No more probesets will be processed, this is a chance to finish outputting
00113    * results and clean up.
00114    * @param qMethod - Quantification method that was used.
00115    * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00116    */
00117   bool finish(QuantMethod &qMethod);
00118   
00119   /**
00120    * Register a Chip Summary interface instance to pull metrics from
00121    */
00122   void registerChipSummary(ChipSummary *summary);
00123 
00124 private:
00125   void removeAllChps();
00126   void removeTmpChps();
00127   /** Swap out the .cel for .chp */
00128   void setupFileNames(const IntensityMart &iMart);
00129 
00130   /** Do a check that the original id we wrote out and the one that
00131       actually came with the probeset group match. */
00132   void checkCurrentId(ProbeSetGroup &psGroup);
00133 
00134   /// Our prefix to filenames, often a path.
00135   std::string m_Prefix;
00136 
00137   /// Our algorithm name. Will be appended before .chp, i.e. mycel.cel-> mycel.algName.chp
00138   std::string m_AlgName;
00139 
00140   /// How many probesets have we seen this far?
00141   int m_CurrentProbeSetCount;
00142   /// Use for writing signals to a buffer. When the buffer is full, write it to CHP files.
00143   affymetrix_calvin_io::CHPQuantificationFileBufferWriter m_ExpressionQuantificationBufferWriter;
00144   /// Names of all of our cel files
00145   std::vector<std::string> m_CELFileNames;
00146   /// Names of all of our chp files, one for each cel file.
00147   std::vector<std::string> m_CHPFileNames;
00148   /// Names of all of our chp files used by buffer writer
00149   std::vector<std::string> m_TmpChpFiles;
00150   /// All the infomation about our algorithm, etc.
00151   AnalysisInfo m_Info;
00152   /// Various Chip Summary Data Sources
00153   std::vector<ChipSummary *> m_ChipSummaries;
00154   /// Vector of probeset results which did not fail
00155   /// this is an index into m_Info.m_ProbesetNames
00156   std::vector<int> m_GoodProbesets;
00157   /// Vector of GUIDs for the respective CEL files
00158   std::vector<std::string> m_celGuids;
00159 };
00160 
00161 #endif /* _QUANTMETHODEXPRCCCHPREPORT_H_ */
